summary: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
cast: Patrick Wilson|Rose Byrne|Ty Simpkins|Lin Shaye|Leigh Whannell|Angus Sampson|Barbara Hershey|Andrew Astor|Corbett Tuck|Heather Tocquigny|Ruben Pla|John Henry Binder|Joseph Bishara|Philip Friedman|J. LaRose|Kelly Hitman|Brynn Bowie|Madison Bowie|Josh Feldman|Caslin Rose|Omar Apanco Salgado|Noah Segura|Jeannette Sousa|Ben Woolf
title: Insidious
